text: (pōr vilakkappaṭṭa tulkaḥtā, tul'hajju, muharram, rajapu ākiya nāṉku) caṅkakaimikka mātaṅkaḷ kaḻintu viṭṭāl muṣrikkukaḷaik kaṇṭa iṭaṅkaḷil veṭṭuṅkaḷ, avarkaḷaip piṭiyuṅkaḷ; avarkaḷai muṟṟukaiyiṭuṅkaḷ, ovvoru patuṅkumiṭattilum avarkaḷaik kuṟivaittu uṭkārntiruṅkaḷ - āṉāl avarkaḷ (maṉattirunti tam pāvaṅkaḷiliruntu) tavpā ceytu mīṇṭu, toḻukaiyaiyum kaṭaippiṭittu (ēḻaivariyākiya) jakāttum (muṟaippaṭik) koṭuttu varuvārkaḷāṉāl (avarkaḷai) avarkaḷ vaḻiyil viṭṭuviṭuṅkaḷ - niccayamāka allāh mikka maṉṉippōṉākavum, kirupaiyuṭaiyavaṉākavum irukkiṉṟāṉ
